https://tmrev.io/movie/781669-A VHS Christmas Carol 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cuRHAEkE3RGo5SDBPFwHgPlDRXp.jpg An adaptation of Charles Dickens’ A Christmas Carol in the style of 80’s music videos. This reimagining of the classic tale offers good feelings of Christmas past and an escape from Christmas present. A cutting edge blend of live and filmed performances straight out of Christmas future. A VHS Christmas Carol
